results.title: Twilio - Connectors
results.description: Twilio Twilio enables apps to send and receive global SMS, MMS and IP messages. This connector is available in the following products and regions: Service Class Regions Copilot Studio Standard All Power Automate regions except the following:       -   US Government (GCC High)       -   China Cloud operated by 21Vianet       -   US Department of.

results.title: Triggers and Bindings in Azure Functions

results.title: Configure a WhatsApp channel through Twilio
results.description: Configure a WhatsApp channel through Twilio Applies to: Dynamics 365 Contact Center—embedded, Dynamics 365 Contact Center—standalone, and Dynamics 365 Customer Service Note Copilot Studio bot is renamed as Copilot agent (agent or AI agent). The WhatsApp channel feature lets you integrate WhatsApp through Twilio with either the Copilot Service.

descriptions.content: Configure a WhatsApp channel through Twilio Applies to: Dynamics 365 Contact Center—embedded, Dynamics 365 Contact Center—standalone, and Dynamics 365 Customer Service Note Copilot Studio bot is renamed as Copilot agent (agent or AI agent).
